00212 BOOLEAN EnterAIM()
00213 {
00214   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00215 
00216       gubWarningTimer = 0;
00217       gubCurrentAdvertisment = AIM_AD_WARNING_BOX;
00218       LaptopInitAim();
00219 
00220       InitAimDefaults();
00221 
00222       // load the MemberShipcard graphic and add it
00223       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00224       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\membercard.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00225       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiMemberCard));
00226 
00227       // load the Policies graphic and add it
00228       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00229       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\Policies.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00230       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiPolicies));
00231 
00232       // load the Links graphic and add it
00233       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00234       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\Links.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00235       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiLinks));
00236 
00237       // load the History graphic and add it
00238       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00239       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_HISTORY );
00240       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiHistory));
00241 
00242       // load the Wanring graphic and add it
00243       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00244       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_WARNING );
00245       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiWarning));
00246 
00247       // load the flower advertisment and add it
00248       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00249       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\flowerad_16.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00250       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiFlowerAdvertisement));
00251 
00252       // load the your ad advertisment and add it
00253       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00254       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_YOURAD13 );
00255       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiAdForAdsImages));
00256 
00257       // load the insurance advertisment and add it
00258       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00259       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_INSURANCEAD10 );
00260       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiInsuranceAdImages));
00261 
00262       // load the funeral advertisment and add it
00263       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00264       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_FUNERALAD9 );
00265       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiFuneralAdImages));
00266 
00267       // load the funeral advertisment and add it
00268       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00269       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_BOBBYRAYAD21 );
00270       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiBobbyRAdImages ));
00271 
00272       
00273 
00274       //** Mouse Regions **
00275 
00276       //Mouse region for the MebershipCard
00277       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedMemberCardRegion, MEMBERCARD_X, MEMBERCARD_Y , (MEMBERCARD_X + LINK_SIZE_X), (MEMBERCARD_Y + LINK_SIZE_Y), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00278                                            CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectMemberCardRegionCallBack ); 
00279   MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedMemberCardRegion); 
00280 
00281       //Mouse region for the Policies
00282       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedPoliciesRegion, POLICIES_X, POLICIES_Y , (POLICIES_X + LINK_SIZE_X), (POLICIES_Y + LINK_SIZE_Y), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00283                                            CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectPoliciesRegionCallBack ); 
00284   MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedPoliciesRegion); 
00285 
00286       //Mouse region for the History
00287       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedHistoryRegion, HISTORY_X, HISTORY_Y , (HISTORY_X + LINK_SIZE_X), (HISTORY_Y + LINK_SIZE_Y), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00288                                            CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectHistoryRegionCallBack ); 
00289   MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedHistoryRegion); 
00290 
00291       //Mouse region for the Links
00292       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedLinksRegion, LINKS_X, LINKS_Y , (LINKS_X + LINK_SIZE_X), (LINKS_Y + LINK_SIZE_Y), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00293                                            CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectLinksRegionCallBack ); 
00294   MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedLinksRegion); 
00295 
00296       //Mouse region for the Links
00297       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedBannerRegion, AIM_AD_TOP_LEFT_X, AIM_AD_TOP_LEFT_Y, AIM_AD_BOTTOM_RIGHT_X, AIM_AD_BOTTOM_RIGHT_Y, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00298                                            CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectBannerRegionCallBack); 
00299   MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedBannerRegion); 
00300 
00301       // disable the region because only certain banners will be 'clickable'
00302   MSYS_DisableRegion(&gSelectedBannerRegion); 
00303 
00304       gubAimMenuButtonDown=255;
00305 
00306       fFirstTimeIn = FALSE;
00307       RenderAIM();
00308 
00309       return( TRUE );
00310 }

00312 void LaptopInitAim()

00314       gfInitAdArea = TRUE;
00315 }
00316 
00317 void ExitAIM()
00318 {
00319       RemoveAimDefaults();
00320 
00321       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiMemberCard);
00322       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiPolicies);
00323       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiLinks);
00324       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiHistory);
00325       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiWarning);
00326       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiFlowerAdvertisement);
00327       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiAdForAdsImages);
00328       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiInsuranceAdImages);
00329       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiFuneralAdImages);
00330       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiBobbyRAdImages);
00331 
00332 
00333       // Remove Mouse Regions
00334   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedMemberCardRegion);
00335   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedPoliciesRegion);
00336   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedLinksRegion);
00337   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedHistoryRegion);
00338   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedBannerRegion);
00339 }

00341 void HandleAIM()
00342 {
00343       HandleAdAndWarningArea( gfInitAdArea, FALSE );
00344       gfInitAdArea = FALSE;
00345 }
00346 
00347 void RenderAIM()
00348 {
00349   HVOBJECT hMemberCardHandle;
00350   HVOBJECT hPoliciesHandle;
00351   HVOBJECT hLinksHandle;
00352   HVOBJECT hHistoryHandle;
00353 //    UINT16      x,y, uiPosX, uiPosY;
00354 
00355       DrawAimDefaults();
00356 
00357       //MemberCard
00358       GetVideoObject(&hMemberCardHandle, guiMemberCard);
00359   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hMemberCardHandle, 0,MEMBERCARD_X, MEMBERCARD_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00360 
00361       //Policies
00362       GetVideoObject(&hPoliciesHandle, guiPolicies);
00363   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPoliciesHandle, 0,POLICIES_X, POLICIES_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00364 
00365       //Links
00366       GetVideoObject(&hLinksHandle, guiLinks);
00367   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLinksHandle, 0,LINKS_X, LINKS_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00368 
00369       //History
00370       GetVideoObject(&hHistoryHandle, guiHistory);
00371   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHistoryHandle, 0,HISTORY_X, HISTORY_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00372 
00373       // Draw the aim slogan under the symbol
00374       DisplayAimSlogan();
00375 
00376       DisplayAimCopyright();
00377 
00378       //Draw text under boxes
00379       // members
00380       DrawTextToScreen(AimBottomMenuText[AIM_MEMBERS], MEMBERCARD_X, MEMBERS_TEXT_Y, LINK_SIZE_X, FONT12ARIAL, AIM_FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00381       // Policies
00382       DrawTextToScreen(AimBottomMenuText[AIM_POLICIES], POLICIES_X, POLICIES_TEXT_Y, LINK_SIZE_X, FONT12ARIAL, AIM_FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00383       // History
00384       DrawTextToScreen(AimBottomMenuText[AIM_HISTORY], HISTORY_X, HISTORY_TEXT_Y, LINK_SIZE_X, FONT12ARIAL, AIM_FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00385       // Links
00386       DrawTextToScreen(AimBottomMenuText[AIM_LINKS], LINKS_X, LINK_TEXT_Y, LINK_SIZE_X, FONT12ARIAL, AIM_FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00387 
00388       HandleAdAndWarningArea( gfInitAdArea, TRUE );
00389 
00390       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00391 
00392   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00393 }

00397 void SelectMemberCardRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00398 { 
00399       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00400       {
00401 
00402       }
00403       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00404       {
00405             if(!fFirstTimeIn)
00406                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_MEMBERS_SORTED_FILES;
00407       }
00408       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00409       {
00410       } 
00411 }
00412

00421       {
00422             guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_POLICIES;
00423       }
00424       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00425       {
00426       } 
00427 }

00462 
00463 BOOLEAN InitAimDefaults()
00464 {
00465   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00466 
00467       // load the Rust bacground graphic and add it
00468       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00469       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\rustbackground.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00470       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiRustBackGround));
00471 
00472       // load the Aim Symbol graphic and add it
00473       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00474       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_AIMSYMBOL );
00475       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiAimSymbol));
00476 
00477       //Mouse region for the Links
00478       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedAimLogo, AIM_SYMBOL_X, AIM_SYMBOL_Y, AIM_SYMBOL_X+AIM_SYMBOL_WIDTH, AIM_SYMBOL_Y+AIM_SYMBOL_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00479                                            CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectAimLogoRegionCallBack); 
00480   MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedAimLogo); 
00481 
00482 
00483       return(TRUE);
00484 }
00485 
00486 BOOLEAN RemoveAimDefaults()
00487 {
00488       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiRustBackGround);
00489       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiAimSymbol);
00490   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedAimLogo);
00491 
00492       return(TRUE);
00493 }
00494 
00495 BOOLEAN DrawAimDefaults()
00496 {
00497   HVOBJECT hRustBackGroundHandle;
00498   HVOBJECT hAimSymbolHandle;
00499       UINT16      x,y, uiPosX, uiPosY;
00500 
00501       // Blt the rust background
00502       GetVideoObject(&hRustBackGroundHandle, guiRustBackGround);
00503 
00504       uiPosY = RUSTBACKGROUND_1_Y;
00505       for(y=0; y<4; y++)
00506       {
00507             uiPosX = RUSTBACKGROUND_1_X;
00508             for(x=0; x<4; x++)
00509             {
00510               BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hRustBackGroundHandle, 0,uiPosX, uiPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00511                   uiPosX += RUSTBACKGROUND_SIZE_X;
00512             }
00513             uiPosY += RUSTBACKGROUND_SIZE_Y;
00514       }
00515 
00516       // Aim Symbol
00517       GetVideoObject(&hAimSymbolHandle, guiAimSymbol);
00518   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hAimSymbolHandle, 0,AIM_SYMBOL_X, AIM_SYMBOL_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00519 
00520       return(TRUE);
00521 }
00522

00524 void SelectAimLogoRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00525 { 
00526       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00527       {
00528       }
00529       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00530       {
00531             guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_AIM;
00532       }
00533       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00534       {
00535       } 
00536 }

00541 BOOLEAN DisplayAimSlogan()
00542 {
00543       wchar_t     sSlogan[400];
00544 
00545       LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(AIMHISTORYFILE, sSlogan, 0, AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE);
00546       //Display Aim Text under the logo
00547       DisplayWrappedString(AIM_LOGO_TEXT_X, AIM_LOGO_TEXT_Y, AIM_LOGO_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, AIM_LOGO_FONT, AIM_FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, sSlogan, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00548 
00549       return(TRUE);
00550 }

00553 
00554 BOOLEAN DisplayAimCopyright()
00555 {
00556       wchar_t     sSlogan[400];
00557       UINT32      uiStartLoc=0;
00558 
00559       //Load and Display the copyright notice 
00560 
00561       uiStartLoc = AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE * AIM_COPYRIGHT_1;
00562       LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(AIMHISTORYFILE, sSlogan, uiStartLoc, AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE);
00563       DrawTextToScreen(sSlogan, AIM_COPYRIGHT_X, AIM_COPYRIGHT_Y, AIM_COPYRIGHT_WIDTH, AIM_COPYRIGHT_FONT, FONT_MCOLOR_DKWHITE, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00564       
00565       uiStartLoc = AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE * AIM_COPYRIGHT_2;
00566       LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(AIMHISTORYFILE, sSlogan, uiStartLoc, AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE);
00567       DrawTextToScreen(sSlogan, AIM_COPYRIGHT_X, AIM_COPYRIGHT_Y + AIM_COPYRIGHT_GAP, AIM_COPYRIGHT_WIDTH, AIM_COPYRIGHT_FONT, FONT_MCOLOR_DKWHITE, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00568 
00569       uiStartLoc = AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE * AIM_COPYRIGHT_3;
00570       LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(AIMHISTORYFILE, sSlogan, uiStartLoc, AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE);
00571       DrawTextToScreen(sSlogan, AIM_COPYRIGHT_X, AIM_COPYRIGHT_Y + AIM_COPYRIGHT_GAP*2, AIM_COPYRIGHT_WIDTH, AIM_COPYRIGHT_FONT, FONT_MCOLOR_DKWHITE, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00572 
00573 
00574       return(TRUE);
00575 }
00576 
00577 // Buttons
00578 BOOLEAN InitAimMenuBar(void)
00579 {
00580       UINT8 i;
00581       UINT16      usPosX;
00582 
00583       guiBottomButtonImage =  LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\BottomButtons2.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00584 
00585       usPosX = BOTTOM_BUTTON_START_X;
00586       for(i=0; i<BOTTOM_BUTTON_AMOUNT; i++)
00587       {
00588             guiBottomButtons[i] = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiBottomButtonImage, AimBottomMenuText[i], FONT10ARIAL, 
00589                                                                                      AIM_BUTTON_ON_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00590                                                                                      AIM_BUTTON_OFF_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00591                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00592                                                                                      usPosX, BOTTOM_BUTTON_START_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00593                                                                                      DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnAimBottomButtonsCallback);
00594             SetButtonCursor(guiBottomButtons[i], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
00595 
00596 
00597             MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiBottomButtons[i], 0, gCurrentAimPage[i]);
00598             MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiBottomButtons[i], 1, i);
00599 
00600             usPosX += BOTTOM_BUTTON_START_WIDTH;
00601       }
00602       return(TRUE);
00603 }
00604 BOOLEAN ExitAimMenuBar(void)
00605 {
00606       UINT8 i;
00607 
00608       UnloadButtonImage( guiBottomButtonImage );
00609 
00610       for(i=0; i<BOTTOM_BUTTON_AMOUNT; i++)
00611       {
00612             RemoveButton( guiBottomButtons[i] );
00613       }
00614       return(TRUE);
00615 }
00616 
00617 
00618 void BtnAimBottomButtonsCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00619 {
00620       UINT32            bNewValue;
00621 
00622       bNewValue = MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
00623       gubAimMenuButtonDown = 255;
00624       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00625       {
00626             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00627 
00628             gubAimMenuButtonDown = (UINT8)MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 1 );
00629             InvalidateRegion(BOTTOM_BUTTON_START_X,BOTTOM_BUTTON_START_Y,BOTTOM_BUTTON_END_X,BOTTOM_BUTTON_END_Y);
00630       }
00631       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00632       {
00633             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00634             {
00635                   ResetAimButtons(guiBottomButtons, NUM_AIM_BOTTOMBUTTONS);
00636 
00637                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = (UINT8)MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
00638 
00639                   InvalidateRegion(BOTTOM_BUTTON_START_X,BOTTOM_BUTTON_START_Y,BOTTOM_BUTTON_END_X,BOTTOM_BUTTON_END_Y);
00640             }
00641       }
00642       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00643       {
00644             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00645             InvalidateRegion(BOTTOM_BUTTON_START_X,BOTTOM_BUTTON_START_Y,BOTTOM_BUTTON_END_X,BOTTOM_BUTTON_END_Y);
00646       }
00647       DisableAimButton();
00648 } 
00649 
00650 
00651 void ResetAimButtons(UINT32 *Buttons, UINT16 uNumberOfButtons)
00652 {
00653   UINT32 cnt;
00654 
00655       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < uNumberOfButtons; cnt++ )
00656       {
00657             ButtonList[ Buttons[ cnt ] ]->uiFlags &= ~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON); 
00658       }
00659 }
00660 
00661 void DisableAimButton()
00662 {
00663       int i=0;
00664 
00665       for(i=0; i<NUM_AIM_BOTTOMBUTTONS; i++)
00666       {
00667             if( gCurrentAimPage[i] == guiCurrentLaptopMode)
00668                   ButtonList[ guiBottomButtons[i] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON; 
00669       }
00670 }
00671 
00672 void HandleAdAndWarningArea( BOOLEAN fInit, BOOLEAN fRedraw )
00673 {
00674       static UINT8 ubPreviousAdvertisment;
00675 
00676       if( fInit )
00677             gubCurrentAdvertisment = AIM_AD_WARNING_BOX;
00678       else
00679       {
00680             if( ubPreviousAdvertisment == AIM_AD_DONE )
00681             {
00682                   gubCurrentAdvertisment = GetNextAimAd( gubCurrentAdvertisment );
00683 
00684                   fInit = TRUE;
00685 
00686 /*
00687                   UINT32      uiDay = GetWorldDay();
00688                   BOOLEAN     fSkip=FALSE;
00689                   gubCurrentAdvertisment++;
00690 
00691                   //if the add should be for Bobby rays
00692                   if( gubCurrentAdvertisment == AIM_AD_BOBBY_RAY_AD )
00693                   {
00694                         //if the player has NOT ever been to drassen
00695                         if( !LaptopSaveInfo.fBobbyRSiteCanBeAccessed )
00696                         {
00697                               //advance to the next add
00698                               gubCurrentAdvertisment++;
00699                         }
00700                         else
00701                         {
00702                               fSkip = TRUE;
00703                               fInit = TRUE;
00704                         }
00705                   }
00706                   else
00707                         fSkip = FALSE;
00708 
00709 
00710                   if( !fSkip )
00711                   {
00712                         //if the current ad is not supposed to be available, loop back to the first ad
00713                         switch( gubCurrentAdvertisment )
00714                         {
00715                               case AIM_AD_FUNERAL_ADS:
00716                                     if( uiDay < AIM_AD_DAY_FUNERAL_AD_STARTS )
00717                                           gubCurrentAdvertisment = AIM_AD_WARNING_BOX;
00718                                     break;
00719 
00720                               case AIM_AD_FLOWER_SHOP:
00721                                     if( uiDay < AIM_AD_DAY_FLOWER_AD_STARTS )
00722                                           gubCurrentAdvertisment = AIM_AD_WARNING_BOX;
00723                                     break;
00724 
00725                               case AIM_AD_INSURANCE_AD:
00726                                     if( uiDay < AIM_AD_DAY_INSURANCE_AD_STARTS )
00727                                           gubCurrentAdvertisment = AIM_AD_WARNING_BOX;
00728                                     break;
00729                         }
00730                         fInit = TRUE;
00731                   }
00732 */
00733             }
00734 
00735             if( gubCurrentAdvertisment >= AIM_AD_LAST_AD)
00736             {
00737                   gubCurrentAdvertisment = AIM_AD_WARNING_BOX;
00738             }
00739       }
00740 
00741       switch( gubCurrentAdvertisment )
00742       {
00743             case  AIM_AD_WARNING_BOX:
00744                   MSYS_DisableRegion(&gSelectedBannerRegion); 
00745                   ubPreviousAdvertisment = DrawWarningBox( fInit, fRedraw );
00746                   break;
00747 
00748             case AIM_AD_FLOWER_SHOP:
00749                   ubPreviousAdvertisment = DisplayFlowerAd( fInit, fRedraw );
00750                   break;
00751 
00752             case AIM_AD_FOR_ADS:
00753                   // disable the region because only certain banners will be 'clickable'
00754                   MSYS_DisableRegion(&gSelectedBannerRegion); 
00755                   ubPreviousAdvertisment = DisplayAd( fInit, fRedraw, AIM_AD_FOR_ADS_DELAY, AIM_AD_FOR_ADS__NUM_SUBIMAGES, guiAdForAdsImages );
00756                   break;
00757 
00758             case AIM_AD_INSURANCE_AD:
00759               MSYS_EnableRegion(&gSelectedBannerRegion);
00760                   ubPreviousAdvertisment = DisplayAd( fInit, fRedraw, AIM_AD_INSURANCE_AD_DELAY, AIM_AD_INSURANCE_AD__NUM_SUBIMAGES, guiInsuranceAdImages );
00761                   break;
00762 
00763             case AIM_AD_FUNERAL_ADS:
00764               MSYS_EnableRegion(&gSelectedBannerRegion);
00765                   ubPreviousAdvertisment = DisplayAd( fInit, fRedraw, AIM_AD_FUNERAL_AD_DELAY, AIM_AD_FUNERAL_AD__NUM_SUBIMAGES, guiFuneralAdImages );
00766                   break;
00767 
00768             case AIM_AD_BOBBY_RAY_AD:
00769               MSYS_EnableRegion(&gSelectedBannerRegion);
00770 //                ubPreviousAdvertisment = DisplayAd( fInit, fRedraw, AIM_AD_BOBBYR_AD_DELAY, AIM_AD_BOBBYR_AD__NUM_SUBIMAGES, guiBobbyRAdImages );
00771                   ubPreviousAdvertisment = DisplayBobbyRAd( fInit, fRedraw );
00772                   break;
00773       }
00774 }
00775 
00776 
00777 
00778 BOOLEAN DisplayFlowerAd( BOOLEAN fInit, BOOLEAN fRedraw )
00779 {
00780       static UINT32 uiLastTime;
00781       static UINT8      ubSubImage=0;
00782       static UINT8      ubCount=0;
00783       UINT32 uiCurTime = GetJA2Clock();
00784 
00785       if( fInit )
00786       {
00787             uiLastTime = 0;
00788             ubSubImage = 0;
00789             ubCount = 0;
00790         MSYS_EnableRegion(&gSelectedBannerRegion);
00791       }
00792 
00793       if( ((uiCurTime - uiLastTime) > AIM_FLOWER_AD_DELAY) || fRedraw)
00794       {
00795             HVOBJECT hAdHandle;
00796 
00797             if( ubSubImage == AIM_FLOWER_NUM_SUBIMAGES)
00798             {
00799                   if(ubCount == 0 || fRedraw)
00800                   {
00801                         //Blit the blue sky frame with text on top
00802                         GetVideoObject(&hAdHandle, guiFlowerAdvertisement);
00803                         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hAdHandle, 0,WARNING_X, WARNING_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00804                         
00805                         // redraw new mail warning, and create new mail button, if nessacary
00806                         fReDrawNewMailFlag = TRUE;
00807        
00808                         //Display Aim Warning Text 
00809                         DisplayWrappedString(AIM_WARNING_TEXT_X, AIM_WARNING_TEXT_Y, AIM_WARNING_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, FONT14ARIAL, FONT_GREEN, AimScreenText[AIM_INFO_6], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00810 
00811                         //Display Aim Warning Text 
00812                         SetFontShadow( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE );
00813                         DisplayWrappedString(AIM_WARNING_TEXT_X, AIM_FLOWER_LINK_TEXT_Y, AIM_WARNING_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, FONT12ARIAL, 2, AimScreenText[AIM_INFO_7], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00814                         SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
00815 
00816                         InvalidateRegion(AIM_AD_TOP_LEFT_X,AIM_AD_TOP_LEFT_Y, AIM_AD_BOTTOM_RIGHT_X   ,AIM_AD_BOTTOM_RIGHT_Y);
00817                   }
00818 
00819                   uiLastTime = GetJA2Clock();
00820 
00821                   ubCount++;
00822                   if( ubCount > 40 )
00823                   {
00824                         return( AIM_AD_DONE );
00825                   }
00826                   else
00827                         return( AIM_AD_NOT_DONE );
00828 
00829             }
00830             else
00831             {
00832                   GetVideoObject(&hAdHandle, guiFlowerAdvertisement);
00833                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hAdHandle, ubSubImage,WARNING_X, WARNING_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00834                   
00835                   // redraw new mail warning, and create new mail button, if nessacary
00836                   fReDrawNewMailFlag = TRUE;
00837       
00838                   ubSubImage++;
00839             }
00840 
00841             uiLastTime = GetJA2Clock();
00842         InvalidateRegion(AIM_AD_TOP_LEFT_X,AIM_AD_TOP_LEFT_Y, AIM_AD_BOTTOM_RIGHT_X ,AIM_AD_BOTTOM_RIGHT_Y);
00843       }
00844       return( AIM_AD_NOT_DONE );
00845 }
00846 
00847 
00848 BOOLEAN     DrawWarningBox( BOOLEAN fInit, BOOLEAN fRedraw )
00849 {
00850       static UINT32 uiLastTime;
00851       static UINT8      ubSubImage=0;
00852       UINT32 uiCurTime = GetJA2Clock();
00853 
00854 
00855       if( fInit || fRedraw)
00856       {
00857             wchar_t                 sText[400];
00858             UINT32      uiStartLoc=0;
00859             UINT16      usLocY = AIM_WARNING_TEXT_Y + (GetFontHeight(AIM_WARNING_FONT) + 2) * 2;
00860             HVOBJECT hWarningHandle;
00861 
00862             //Warning
00863             GetVideoObject(&hWarningHandle, guiWarning);
00864             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hWarningHandle, 0,WARNING_X, WARNING_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00865 
00866 
00867             uiStartLoc = AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE * AIM_WARNING_1;
00868             LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(AIMHISTORYFILE, sText, uiStartLoc, AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE);
00869 
00870             //Display Aim Warning Text 
00871             DisplayWrappedString(AIM_WARNING_TEXT_X, AIM_WARNING_TEXT_Y, AIM_WARNING_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, AIM_WARNING_FONT, FONT_RED, sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00872 
00873             InvalidateRegion(AIM_AD_TOP_LEFT_X,AIM_AD_TOP_LEFT_Y, AIM_AD_BOTTOM_RIGHT_X   ,AIM_AD_BOTTOM_RIGHT_Y);
00874 
00875             // redraw new mail warning, and create new mail button, if nessacary
00876             fReDrawNewMailFlag = TRUE;
00877 
00878             if( fInit )
00879                   uiLastTime = uiCurTime;
00880       }
00881 
00882       if( (uiCurTime - uiLastTime) > AIM_WARNING_TIME)
00883             return(AIM_AD_DONE);
00884       else
00885       {
00886             return(AIM_AD_NOT_DONE);
00887       }
00888 }
00889 
00890 void SelectBannerRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00891 { 
00892       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00893       {
00894       }
00895       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00896       {
00897             if( gubCurrentAdvertisment == AIM_AD_FLOWER_SHOP )
00898                   GoToWebPage( FLORIST_BOOKMARK );
00899             else if( gubCurrentAdvertisment == AIM_AD_INSURANCE_AD )
00900                   GoToWebPage( INSURANCE_BOOKMARK );
00901             else if( gubCurrentAdvertisment == AIM_AD_FUNERAL_ADS )
00902                   GoToWebPage( FUNERAL_BOOKMARK );
00903             else if( gubCurrentAdvertisment == AIM_AD_BOBBY_RAY_AD )
00904                   GoToWebPage( BOBBYR_BOOKMARK );
00905 
00906 
00907       }
00908       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00909       {
00910       } 
00911 }
00912 
00913 
00914 
00915 
00916 BOOLEAN DisplayAd( BOOLEAN fInit, BOOLEAN fRedraw, UINT16 usDelay, UINT16 usNumberOfSubImages, UINT32 uiAdImageIdentifier )
00917 {
00918       static UINT32 uiLastTime;
00919       static UINT8      ubSubImage=0;
00920       static UINT8      ubCount=0;
00921       UINT32 uiCurTime = GetJA2Clock();
00922       UINT8 ubRetVal = 0;
00923 
00924       if( fInit )
00925       {
00926             uiLastTime = 0;
00927             ubSubImage = 0;
00928             ubCount = 0;
00929       }
00930 
00931       if( ((uiCurTime - uiLastTime) > usDelay) || fRedraw)
00932       {
00933             HVOBJECT hAdHandle;
00934 
00935             if( ubSubImage == 0 )
00936             {
00937                   if(ubCount == 0 || fRedraw)
00938                   {
00939                         //Blit the ad
00940                         GetVideoObject(&hAdHandle, uiAdImageIdentifier);
00941                         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hAdHandle, 0,WARNING_X, WARNING_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00942                         
00943                         // redraw new mail warning, and create new mail button, if nessacary
00944                         fReDrawNewMailFlag = TRUE;
00945        
00946                         InvalidateRegion(AIM_AD_TOP_LEFT_X,AIM_AD_TOP_LEFT_Y, AIM_AD_BOTTOM_RIGHT_X   ,AIM_AD_BOTTOM_RIGHT_Y);
00947                   }
00948 
00949                   uiLastTime = GetJA2Clock();
00950 
00951                   //display first frame longer then rest
00952                   ubCount++;
00953                   if( ubCount > 12 )
00954                   {
00955                         ubCount=0;
00956                         ubSubImage++;
00957                   }
00958 
00959                   ubRetVal = AIM_AD_NOT_DONE;
00960 
00961             }
00962             else if( ubSubImage == usNumberOfSubImages-1 )
00963             {
00964                   if(ubCount == 0 || fRedraw)
00965                   {
00966                         //Blit the ad
00967                         GetVideoObject(&hAdHandle, uiAdImageIdentifier);
00968                         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hAdHandle, ubSubImage,WARNING_X, WARNING_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00969                         
00970                         // redraw new mail warning, and create new mail button, if nessacary
00971                         fReDrawNewMailFlag = TRUE;
00972        
00973                         InvalidateRegion(AIM_AD_TOP_LEFT_X,AIM_AD_TOP_LEFT_Y, AIM_AD_BOTTOM_RIGHT_X   ,AIM_AD_BOTTOM_RIGHT_Y);
00974                   }
00975 
00976                   uiLastTime = GetJA2Clock();
00977 
00978                   //display first frame longer then rest
00979                   ubCount++;
00980                   if( ubCount > 12 )
00981                   {
00982                         ubRetVal = AIM_AD_DONE;
00983                   }
00984             }
00985             else
00986             {
00987                   GetVideoObject(&hAdHandle, uiAdImageIdentifier);
00988                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hAdHandle, ubSubImage,WARNING_X, WARNING_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00989                   
00990                   // redraw new mail warning, and create new mail button, if nessacary
00991                   fReDrawNewMailFlag = TRUE;
00992       
00993                   ubSubImage++;
00994             }
00995 
00996             //if the add it to have text on it, then put the text on it.
00997             HandleTextOnAimAdd( ubSubImage );
00998 
00999             uiLastTime = GetJA2Clock();
01000         InvalidateRegion(AIM_AD_TOP_LEFT_X,AIM_AD_TOP_LEFT_Y, AIM_AD_BOTTOM_RIGHT_X ,AIM_AD_BOTTOM_RIGHT_Y);
01001       }
01002       return( ubRetVal );
01003 }
01004 
01005 void HandleTextOnAimAdd( UINT8 ubCurSubImage )
01006 {
01007       switch( gubCurrentAdvertisment )
01008       {
01009             case  AIM_AD_WARNING_BOX:
01010                   break;
01011 
01012             case AIM_AD_FLOWER_SHOP:
01013                   break;
01014 
01015             case AIM_AD_FOR_ADS:
01016                   break;
01017 
01018             case AIM_AD_INSURANCE_AD:
01019                   break;
01020 
01021             case AIM_AD_FUNERAL_ADS:
01022                   break;
01023 
01024             case AIM_AD_BOBBY_RAY_AD:
01025 
01026                   //if the subimage is the first couple
01027                   if( ubCurSubImage <= AIM_AD_BOBBYR_AD_NUM_DUCK_SUBIMAGES )
01028                   {
01029                         //Display Aim Warning Text 
01030                         SetFontShadow( 2 );
01031                         DisplayWrappedString(AIM_BOBBYR1_LINK_TEXT_X, AIM_BOBBYR1_LINK_TEXT_Y, AIM_WARNING_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, BOBBYR_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION_AD_FONT, BOBBYR_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION_AD_COLOR, AimScreenText[AIM_BOBBYR_ADD1], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED | INVALIDATE_TEXT );
01032                         SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
01033                   }
01034 
01035 
01036                   else if( ubCurSubImage >= AIM_AD_BOBBYR_AD__NUM_SUBIMAGES-5 )
01037                   {
01038                         //Display Aim Warning Text 
01039                         SetFontShadow( 2 );
01040                         DisplayWrappedString(AIM_BOBBYR2_LINK_TEXT_X, AIM_BOBBYR2_LINK_TEXT_Y, AIM_WARNING_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, BOBBYR_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION_AD_FONT, BOBBYR_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION_AD_COLOR, AimScreenText[AIM_BOBBYR_ADD2], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED | INVALIDATE_TEXT ) ;
01041                         SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
01042                   }
01043 /*
01044                   else
01045                   {
01046                         //Display Aim Warning Text 
01047                         SetFontShadow( 2 );
01048 //                      DisplayWrappedString( AIM_BOBBYR3_LINK_TEXT_X, AIM_BOBBYR3_LINK_TEXT_Y, AIM_WARNING_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, BOBBYR_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION_AD_FONT, FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, AimScreenText[AIM_BOBBYR_ADD3], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED | INVALIDATE_TEXT );
01049                         SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
01050                   }
01051 */
01052                   break;
01053       }
01054 }
01055 
01056 
01057 
01058 BOOLEAN DisplayBobbyRAd( BOOLEAN fInit, BOOLEAN fRedraw )
01059 {
01060       static UINT32 uiLastTime;
01061       static UINT8      ubSubImage=0;
01062       static UINT8      ubDuckCount=0;
01063       static UINT8      ubCount=0;
01064       UINT32 uiCurTime = GetJA2Clock();
01065       UINT8 ubRetVal = 0;
01066       UINT16      usDelay = AIM_AD_BOBBYR_AD_DELAY;
01067 
01068 
01069       if( fInit )
01070       {
01071             ubDuckCount = 0;
01072             uiLastTime = 0;
01073             ubSubImage = 0;
01074             ubCount = 0;
01075       }
01076 
01077       if( ((uiCurTime - uiLastTime) > usDelay) || fRedraw)
01078       {
01079             HVOBJECT hAdHandle;
01080 
01081             //Loop through the first 6 images twice, then start into the later ones
01082             GetVideoObject(&hAdHandle, guiBobbyRAdImages);
01083 
01084             //if we are still looping through the first 6 animations
01085             if( ubDuckCount < 2 )
01086             {
01087                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hAdHandle, ubSubImage, WARNING_X, WARNING_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01088 
01089                   ubSubImage ++;
01090 
01091                   InvalidateRegion(AIM_AD_TOP_LEFT_X,AIM_AD_TOP_LEFT_Y, AIM_AD_BOTTOM_RIGHT_X   ,AIM_AD_BOTTOM_RIGHT_Y);
01092 
01093                   // if we do the first set of images
01094                   if( ubSubImage > AIM_AD_BOBBYR_AD_NUM_DUCK_SUBIMAGES )
01095                   {
01096                         ubDuckCount++;
01097 
01098                         if( ubDuckCount < 2 )
01099                               ubSubImage = 0;
01100                         else
01101                               ubSubImage = AIM_AD_BOBBYR_AD_NUM_DUCK_SUBIMAGES+1;
01102                   }
01103                   ubRetVal = AIM_AD_NOT_DONE;
01104             }
01105 
01106             else
01107             {
01108                   //Blit the ad
01109                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hAdHandle, ubSubImage,WARNING_X, WARNING_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01110 
01111                   ubSubImage ++;
01112 
01113                   if( ubSubImage >= AIM_AD_BOBBYR_AD__NUM_SUBIMAGES-1 )
01114                   {
01115                         //display last frame longer then rest
01116                         ubCount++;
01117                         if( ubCount > 12 )
01118                         {
01119                               ubRetVal = AIM_AD_DONE;
01120                         }
01121

01132             HandleTextOnAimAdd( ubSubImage );

01135             uiLastTime = GetJA2Clock();

01217 
01218 
01219 UINT8 GetNextAimAd( UINT8 ubCurrentAd )
01220 {
01221       UINT8 ubNextAd;
01222       UINT32      uiDay = GetWorldDay();
01223       BOOLEAN     fSkip=FALSE;
01224 
01225       if( ubCurrentAd == AIM_AD_WARNING_BOX )
01226       {
01227             if( uiDay < AIM_AD_BOBBYR_AD_STARTS )
01228             {
01229                   //if the player has NOT ever been to drassen
01230                   if( !LaptopSaveInfo.fBobbyRSiteCanBeAccessed )
01231                   {
01232                         ubNextAd = AIM_AD_FOR_ADS;
01233                   }
01234                   else
01235                   {
01236                         ubNextAd = AIM_AD_BOBBY_RAY_AD;
01237                   }
01238             }
01239 
01240             else if( uiDay < AIM_AD_DAY_FUNERAL_AD_STARTS )
01241                   ubNextAd = AIM_AD_FUNERAL_ADS;
01242 
01243             else if( uiDay < AIM_AD_DAY_FLOWER_AD_STARTS )
01244                   ubNextAd = AIM_AD_FLOWER_SHOP;
01245 
01246             else //if( uiDay < AIM_AD_DAY_INSURANCE_AD_STARTS )
01247                   ubNextAd = AIM_AD_INSURANCE_AD;
01248       }
01249       else
01250       {
01251             ubNextAd = AIM_AD_WARNING_BOX;
01252       }
01253 
01254       return( ubNextAd );
01255 }
